revised_title: Thermal Properties and Vapour-Pressures of Propyl Alcohol
tldr: The author conducted experiments to study the thermal properties and vapour-pressures of propyl alcohol. They found that the composition of the "hydrate" of propyl alcohol depends on the pressure under which the liquid is distilled. The author also determined the vapour-pressures of varying mixtures of propyl alcohol and water at different temperatures, and concluded that there is no chemical combination between propyl alcohol and water.
